summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue North, from Helen Street to the north line of Interlaken, an addition to the City of Seattle, and Turner Way, from Twenty-third Avenue North to Helen Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with crosswalks, catch basins and box drains to provide for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1288 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
